attributes.description: Total number of CCS reads in the input file; this will be identical to the value in the CCS report
attributes.name: Number of consensus reads

attributes.description: The number of CCS reads with a 5-prime signal detected
attributes.name: Number of five prime reads

attributes.description: The number of CCS reads with a 3-prime signal detected
attributes.name: Number of three prime reads

attributes.description: The number of CCS reads with poly-A and 3-prime signals detected
attributes.name: Number of poly-A reads

attributes.description: The number of CCS reads whose read length is less than the specified minimum sequence length
attributes.name: Number of filtered short reads

attributes.description: The number of non-full-length CCS reads; these are missing the poly-A tail and/or a terminal signal
attributes.name: Number of non-full-length reads

attributes.description: The number of full-length CCS reads. (Full-length reads are reads which have both prime signals and poly-A detected.)
attributes.name: Number of full-length reads

attributes.description: The number of full-length CCS reads that are not artificial concatemers
attributes.name: Number of full-length non-chimeric reads

attributes.description: Mean length of full-length, non-artificial-concatemer CCS reads
attributes.name: Mean full-length non-chimeric read length

attributes.description: The number of non-full-length non-artificial-concatemer CCS reads
attributes.name: Number of non-full-length non-chimeric reads

attributes.description: The number of non-full-length reads that are artificial concatemers
attributes.name: Number of non-full-length chimeric reads

attributes.description: Total number of bases in full-length non-artificial-concatemer CCS reads
attributes.name: Number of full-length non-chimeric bases
